com.mumfrey.liteloader.modconfig

Interface ConfigPanel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConfigPanel

    public interface ConfigPanel
    Interface for mod config panels to implement
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawPanel(ConfigPanelHost host, int mouseX, int mouseY, float partialTicks)
      Draw the configuration panel
      int getContentHeight()
      Get the height of the content area for scrolling purposes, return -1 to disable scrolling.
      java.lang.String getPanelTitle()
      Panels should return the text to display at the top of the config panel window.
      void keyPressed(ConfigPanelHost host, char keyChar, int keyCode)
      Called when a key is pressed
      void mouseMoved(ConfigPanelHost host, int mouseX, int mouseY)
      Called when the mouse is moved
      void mousePressed(ConfigPanelHost host, int mouseX, int mouseY, int mouseButton)
      Called when a mouse button is pressed
      void mouseReleased(ConfigPanelHost host, int mouseX, int mouseY, int mouseButton)
      Called when a mouse button is released
      void onPanelHidden()
      Called when the panel is closed, panel should save settings
      void onPanelResize(ConfigPanelHost host)
      Called when the window is resized whilst the panel is active
      void onPanelShown(ConfigPanelHost host)
      Called when the panel is displayed, initialise the panel (read settings, etc)
      void onTick(ConfigPanelHost host)
      Called every tick

    • Method Detail

      • getPanelTitle

        java.lang.String getPanelTitle()
